altername_name: Jojo no Kimyou na Bouken: All-Star Battle R
name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All-Star Battle R
overview: Well known for its charismatic heroes, striking art style, and unforgettable catch phrases (“Yare yare daze…”), another installment of JoJo’s Bizarre Adventure is coming! JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All-Star Battle R!
